data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chavez, German, Vasquez, Diego (2012): A new species of Andean semiaquatic lizard of the genus Potamites (Sauria, Gymnophtalmidae) from southern Peru. ZooKeys 168: 31-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.168.2048, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.168.2048
